tool.name: Create or Update Organism
tool.description: will create the organism if it doesn't exist, and update otherwise

param.name: jbrowse
param.label: JBrowse HTML Output
param.help: Please read the important warnings in the help section below

param.name: group
param.label: Grant access to a user group

tool.help:
**What it does**
Adds an organism to the Apollo database. The tool takes the output of a JBrowse run as that contains all of the necessary information for which tracks are appropriate for a given analysis.
**WARNINGS**
- You must login at least once on the Apollo server with your current user account before using this tool (in order for Apollo to properly assign you as the owner of the organism). - Do not use names which conflict with other users. - If you provide an Apollo JSON file, only the first organism block will be used in Common Name determination, as it is improbable you wish to apply a single JBrowse instance to multiple organisms.
@REFERENCES@
